story.text: Jan 3 Appliance maker Whirlpool Corp. (WHR.N) said it sold some former Maytag Corp. facilities in Newton, Iowa; Florence, South Carolina; Galesburg and Herrin, Illinois; Searcy, Arkansas; and Ranson, West Virginia. Whirlpool also said it sold the majority of the Maytag headquarters building complex to Iowa Telecommunications Services Inc. IWA.N. The company has the option to sell the vacant Maytag manufacturing facility to the Jasper Community Foundation. Whirlpool did not disclose the terms. The company had acquired Maytag in April 2006. (Reporting by Shikhar Balwani in Bangalore)
story.title: whirlpool sells some former maytag facilities
